ideas.title: Yarra Trams Cup Day Chaos
ideas.premise: A Yarra Trams conductor is desperately trying to announce stops, but can only shout “HALF!” before being drowned out by celebrating racegoers.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Melbourne public transport struggles meet Cup Day excitement.

ideas.title: The Phar Lap Statue's Reaction
ideas.premise: The Phar Lap statue at Flemington looks unimpressed as Half Yours speeds past it on a Vespa.
ideas.why_funny: Iconic statue juxtaposed with modern, less majestic victory.

ideas.title: Flemington Fashion Police
ideas.premise: Two Flemington Fashion Police officers (wearing oversized fascinators as badges) arrest a horse for not wearing a hat.
ideas.why_funny: Poking fun at the over-the-top fashion focus of the Melbourne Cup.

ideas.title: Jamie's Double Diamond
ideas.premise: Jamie Melham is presented with two oversized diamonds, one for the Melbourne Cup and another for her jockey double, which she struggles to carry.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerated reward highlighting her historic achievement.

ideas.title: Betting Shop Blues
ideas.premise: A forlorn-looking man outside a TAB (betting shop) is holding a losing ticket that says 'ALL Mine,' looking sadly at a horse named Half Yours in the winner's circle.
ideas.why_funny: Classic betting shop heartbreak with a wordplay twist.

headlines.summary: Jamie Melham became only the second woman jockey to win the Aus$10 million (U.S.$6.5 million) Melbourne Cup Tuesday, steering Half Yours to victory in
